channel.title: Lock
channel.description: Okay, I Need Help With My Yell Command, Nothing Is Wrong With It I Just Want Titles, Donator, Mod, Admin, Co-owner, Owner! Please Help And I Want It For Donator+ THANKS! REMEMBER THIS IS A PI SOURCE!

item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote="[C"]oder [P]erses link=topic=470503.msg3440569#msg3440569 date=1293061363]

[quote author=[C]oder [P]erses link=topic=470503.msg3440416#msg3440416 date=1293054460]
I Got A Error… Here It Is:

[code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:65: ‘)’ expected
yell.sendMessage("[" + title + "]: " + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerNam
e) + " - " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5));

                                                      ^

1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

yell.sendMessage("[" + title + "]: " + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " - " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5));

It tells you in this line your missing a ‘)’…
[/quote]I Know I Just Didn’t See Where… And He Fixed It So Stoop Trolling.[/quote]
He’s not trolling idiot, he’s trying to help you out…

item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @_C_oder_P_erses [C]oder [P]erses
item.description:
@_C_oder_P_erses wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Oh, you’re using Tragedy Pking, or something based from it.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell"))
{
    String title = "";

    for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++)
    {
        if (c.donator == 1)
            continue;
        if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null)
        {
            Client yell = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
            if (c.donator > 0)
            {
                switch (c.playerRights)
                {
                    case 1:
                        title = "Moderator";
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        title = "Administrator";
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        title = "Co-Owner";
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        title = "Owner";
                        break;
                }
            } else if (c.donator > 0 && c.playerRights == 0)
                title = "Donator";
            yell.sendMessage("[" + title + "]: " + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " - " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5));
        }
    }
}

Try that.[/quote]I Got A Error… Here It Is:

[code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:65: ‘)’ expected
yell.sendMessage("[" + title + "]: " + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerNam
e) + " - " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5));

                                                      ^

1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @_C_oder_P_erses [C]oder [P]erses
item.description:
@_C_oder_P_erses wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][code=Java]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”))
{
String title = “”;
String customs[][] = { {“Username”, “Custom Title”}, {“Username”, “Custom Title”}};

for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++)
{
    if (c.donator == 1)
        continue;
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null)
    {
        Client yell = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
        for (int i; i < customs.length(); i++)
        {
            switch (c.playerRights)
            {
                case 1:
                    title = "Moderator";
                    break;
                case 2:
                    title = "Administrator";
                    break;
                case 3:
                    title = "Owner";
                    break;
                case 4:
                    title = "Player";
                    break;
            }
            for (String x : customs[i][0])
            {
                if (x == c.playerName)
                    title = customs[i][1];
            }
            if (c.donator == 1)
                title = "Donator";
        }
        yell.sendMessage("[" + title + "]: " + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " - " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5));
    }
}

}[/code]
Try that.

Also, the custom is for co-owners, etc.[/quote]Okay But, Playerrights = 3 Is Co-Owner… Playerrights = 4 Is Owner.

Read full topic

item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @_C_oder_P_erses [C]oder [P]erses
item.description:
@_C_oder_P_erses wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I don’t recommend using Dells’ as it can be very messy.

Here’s a decent one;

[code=Java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”))
{
String title = “”;
String customs[][] = { {“Username”, “Custom Title”}, {“Username”, “Custom Title”}};

for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++)
{
    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null)
    {
        Client yell = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
        for (int i; i < customs.length(); i++)
        {
            switch (c.playerRights)
            {
                default:
                case 0:
                    title = "Player";
                    break;
                case 1:
                    title = "Moderator";
                    break;
                case 2:
                    title = "Administrator";
                    break;
                case 3:
                    title = "Owner";
                    break;
                case 4:
                    title = "Player";
                    break;
            }
            for (String x : customs[i][0])
            {
                if (x == c.playerName)
                    title = customs[i][1];
            }
        }
        yell.sendMessage("[" + title + "]: " + Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) + " - " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5));
    }
}

}[/code]I’m not sure if that would yell twice due to playerRights / custom title, but it’s worth a try.[/quote]Okay, But I Am Confused On The case 0-4 and String customs[][] = { {"Username", "Custom Title"}, {"Username", "Custom Title"}}; What Are The case’s And Custom’s? And Also I Don’t Want Players To Be Able To Use…

Read full topic

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
if (c.playerRights == 0){
c.sendMessage(“You must be a donator to use this command!”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 1){

							c2.sendMessage("[Mod]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText

(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 2){

							c2.sendMessage("[Admin]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText

(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
c2.sendMessage("[Co-Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +":

"
+ Misc.optimizeText

(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 4){
c2.sendMessage("[Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText

(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}else if (c.playerRights == 5){
c2.sendMessage("[Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText

(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}
}
}
}
}[/code]

item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
if (c.playerRights == 0){
c.sendMessage(“You must be a donator to use this command!”);
}
if (c.playerRights == 1){

							c2.sendMessage("[Mod]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
						
							c2.sendMessage("[Admin]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("[Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 4){
							c2.sendMessage("[Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
					}
					}
				}
			}[/code]

You can change it to your liking.
